Description: Pottery ostracon with text containing the beginning of a letter frorm a monk to Apa Frange.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.84-85, pl.62)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82737) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82737)
